# Introduction

This is supplementary material to our paper published at [AICS 2025](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.09633)  with the data and R code used for creating some figures in the paper.

# R code

## DataFrame

## [Fig. 1](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2512.09633)

```{r  message=FALSE, warning=FALSE,echo=TRUE}
ggplot(data, aes(x=mObjSize, y=mOverlap,  color=datasetname)) +
  geom_point(size=3)+
  xlab("Object size category")+
  ylab("Relative BB overlaps")+
  labs(color="Datasets")+
  theme_bw()
```

## [Fig. 2 (left)](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2512.09633)

```{r  message=FALSE, warning=FALSE,echo=TRUE}

ggplot(data, aes(x=datasetname, y=mIoU, fill=Tracker)) + 
  geom_boxplot()+
  xlab("Dataset names")+
  theme_bw()
```


##  [Fig. 2 (right)](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2512.09633)

```{r  message=FALSE, warning=FALSE,echo=TRUE}
ggplot(data, aes(x=datasetname, y=mDice, fill=Tracker)) + 
  geom_boxplot()+
  xlab("Dataset names")+
  theme_bw()
```


## [Tab. 1](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2512.09633)

```{r  message=FALSE, warning=FALSE,echo=TRUE}

library(dplyr)

summary_mIoU <- data %>%
  group_by(Tracker) %>%
  summarise(
    MIN_mIoU= min(mIoU),
    MAX_mIoU= max(mIoU),
    MEDIAN_mIoU = median(mIoU),
    MEAN_mIoU = mean(mIoU)
  )


summary_mDice <- data %>%
  group_by(Tracker) %>%
  summarise(
    MIN_mDice= min(mDice),
    MAX_mDice= max(mDice),
    MEDIAN_mDice = median(mDice),
    MEAN_mDice = mean(mDice)
  )

kable(summary_mIoU) 
kable(summary_mDice)  
```
